patterns: Can I get information on ATV rides?
What does the ATV ride package include?
I'd like to know more about the ATV ride.
What are the options for ATV rides?
responses: Certainly! Our ATV Ride packages are as follows: 1) Full Package: Dinner, breakfast, morning tea, camping night, a 2km ATV bike ride, and BBQ grill for LKR4500 per person. 2) Standard Package: Dinner, breakfast, morning tea, camping night, and BBQ grill for LKR3000 per person. 3) Camping Only: Just the camping experience for LKR1000 per person. 4) ATV Ride Only: Choose from a 1.5km basic track for LKR2000, a 2km track for LKR2500, a 2km track with a muddy trail for LKR3000, or a full 2km muddy track experience for LKR4000. For bookings, contact us at 0716012892.

responses: Our Nature Life Eco Resort offers a serene experience with these packages: 1) Deluxe Package: Dinner, breakfast, morning tea, cabana night, a 2km ATV bike ride, and BBQ grill for LKR5500 per person. 2) Comfort Package: Dinner, breakfast, morning tea, cabana night, and BBQ grill for LKR3800 per person. 3) Cabana Only: A peaceful stay in our cabana for LKR1500 per person. To reserve your stay, reach out to us at 0716012892.
